title: Mom Mom's Meatballs
description:
Jay brings his Mom Mom's recipe of Sweet & Sour Meatballs & Cottage Cheese Noodles after cooking it up himself the night before. The gang goes over a couple of stand out performances from America's Got Talent.

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire
